<b>This offer is for new customers only!</b>

[LunaNode](https://lunanode.com) is a cloud platform in Toronto. We offer an extensive array of cloud features:

* <b>Hourly Billing</b>: our services are billed hourly! [See pricing here.](https://www.lunanode.com/pricing)
* <b>Live Snapshots</b>: whether you use it for templating or backups, snapshots are super convenient. You can take consistent snapshots without even turning off your VM!
* <b>Volumes (Block Storage)</b>: volumes are block devices that can be attached/detached between your VMs, and are stored on a redundant Ceph cluster. Pricing is just $0.03/GB/mo.
* <b>Uptime Monitoring, DNS, E-mail</b>: active customers (used at least $3 credit in the current month) can use our [uptime monitoring](https://wiki.lunanode.com/index.php/Server_monitoring), [DNS](https://wiki.lunanode.com/index.php/DNS), and e-mail platforms for free (with limits on free usage)!

If you are not an existing LunaNode customer and you participated in the 2018 H1 provider poll, then we'll give you $20 free credit! Just follow these steps:

* Sign up for an account at https://lunanode.com
* PM me the e-mail address associated with your account so I can add the credit.
* Must not already be an active/past customer of LunaNode. Sorry!

You will only be able to use the credit for services in Toronto. If you make a payment later you will be able to use our other locations (OVH Montreal/Roubaix) as well.

(This offer is valid until 2 October 2018. It may or may not be available after that, check the comments below.)
